mapper.select: SELECT id, vaccine_id, batch_no, production_date, expiry_date, stock, warning_days, status, created_at, updated_at FROM vaccine_batch WHERE vaccine_id = #{vaccineId} AND stock > 0 AND expiry_date > CURDATE() AND status IN (0, 1) ORDER BY expiry_date ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE vaccine_batch SET stock = stock - 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{batchId} AND stock > 0
UPDATE vaccine_batch SET status = 2, updated_at = NOW() WHERE expiry_date < #{date} AND status IN (0, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT b.vaccine_id AS vaccineId, v.vaccine_name AS vaccineName, COALESCE(SUM(b.stock), 0) AS stock FROM vaccine_batch b INNER JOIN vaccine v ON b.vaccine_id = v.id WHERE b.stock > 0 AND b.expiry_date > CURDATE() AND b.status IN (0, 1) GROUP BY b.vaccine_id, v.vaccine_name ORDER BY b.vaccine_id
